title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
Research Questions


Are there changes in youths’ views of their future selves as spouses, parents, and workers?

Do these projected future selves vary by gender?

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text: Predicted % from ordinal logistic regression with year + year2

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text: Predicted % from ordinal logistic regression with year, year2, gender, mom’s edu., race, & region

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
These next questions ask you to guess how well you might do in several different situations. How good do you think you would be as a:





husband or wife?
parent?
worker on a job?




Response options:

poor
not so good
fairly good
good
very good
